html:
9.30.22  5:24 pm   have you ever dreamed of having a totally normal, uneventful day?

      yes

9.30.22  5:24 pm   are you a fan of lists

      yes

9.30.22  4:23 pm   what is the story behind the song "at the airport terminal"?

      the first line is something i came up with, while having some special feelings about the airport terminal experience. the rest of the song was written and produced according to best practices. the video was produced too fast and too slow

9.30.22  4:19 pm   do you know the significance of the ball and the stick

      could make a neat stage picture

9.30.22  4:11 pm   how many minutes of a standing ovation are you aiming for

      none. that sounds like a waste of time

9.30.22  2:01 pm   is it possible to make a mistake on purpose?

      just about

9.30.22  1:23 pm   the font on parts of your website seems to have changed. why?

      because you changed the font on your viewing device

9.30.22  11:30 am   Why do you like music?

      it allows me to win friends and influence people

9.30.22  11:02 am   opinion on pancakes?

      too tall

9.30.22  10:18 am   why is it important to write 'bad' music first?

      music loves surprises. therefore, this may start a chain reaction and cause it to come out great

9.30.22  10:06 am   What made you start making music?

      music

9.30.22  8:50 am   Is there a method to the madness?

      methods are madness

9.30.22  7:46 am   what are your thoughts on October

      too long

9.30.22  5:37 am   Would you ever compose music that's completely in 7/4 time?

      sure. but not for that reason

9.30.22  1:05 am   do you think pretzels taste good?

      maybe if you've never had chocolate

9.30.22  12:48 am   How do you decide when to do things

      there are 4 ways. all now, all never, checker pattern, artistic

9.29.22  11:00 pm   Are you winning?

      it's a tie

9.29.22  10:50 pm   I think and then I forget. Do you think? And do you forget?

     i don't recall that, but, what i do remember is remembering

     Should I stop thinking or should I stop forgetting?

     no

9.29.22  10:10 pm   what do you think of the hurdy-gurdy

      over priced

9.29.22  9:43 pm   What is bad weather

      great weather

9.29.22  9:33 pm   What made you create the video "brick floor"?

      testing

9.29.22  8:06 pm   what is the best name

      all names are bad. that's what makes them so good

9.29.22  6:55 pm   is i wanna be a movie star the most complex song you've ever made?

      it seems like one of the simplest

9.29.22  5:43 pm   is interpretation necessarily illusion?

      no

9.29.22  5:40 pm   you inspired me to write something, do you also get inspired by other people's words sometimes?

      yes

9.29.22  4:01 pm   How do I work even though it's boring and I don't want to?

      what are you working on

9.29.22  1:59 pm   if you were an elementary school teacher, which subject would you choose?

      time

9.29.22  12:44 pm   do you get enough sleep

      too much

9.29.22  12:00 pm   is music different now or is it the same its always been

      it's always the same and different

9.29.22  8:11 am   Do you know how to dance?

      i know it's always a different way

9.29.22  5:49 am   how do you feel about wednesdays?

      pretty good

9.29.22  4:38 am   what is a huge bureaucratic hurdle that you have to deal with every time you upload a song, if any?

      it has to be good

9.29.22  3:27 am   Do you still pick random songs from a running list of song ideas to figure out what you'll do next?

     i've been on a quasi-random method ever since late 2017. i start by selecting things manually from the list, then after i've done that, i've usually gathered somewhere between 5 and 30, and then i randomize from amongst those finalists

     If so, what will you do when you run out?

     i'll never technically run out because there's some that i'll never want to do, and to counter balance that, i generate several new ones before each selection process

9.29.22  3:22 am   what do you think about tents

      they're getting better all the time

9.29.22  2:16 am   Bill, i got some singing questions. I know that guys and gals got different ranges, but do they have the same point at which head and chest voice switch?

     i have no idea

     It seems that the top and bottom of boys and girls ranges are only about a minor or major third apart, on average. So how come guys often sing an octave lower? Are they better at chest vice and girls are better with head voice, generally? Im confused ack

     the only method of singing i know is like method acting. the physics of singing are so unknown to me that i have no ability to control or access it directly. the only technique i know is imagination of scene and scenario. and THAT seems to affect everything

9.29.22  1:20 am   can money buy happiness

      sadness buys happiness. happiness buys sadness. money and non-money also are able to purchase each other

9.29.22  1:12 am   How do I turn how I feel into music?

      no one knows how to do that. doing it well sometimes involves knowing less

9.28.22  11:53 pm   Why do humans play games?

      to get ideas

9.28.22  11:16 pm   what are your inspirations

      good and bad weather

9.28.22  10:03 pm   What language do bilingual people think in?

      both

9.28.22  9:12 pm   How can I stop thinking about how I am feeling every moment of my existence?

      play some quizzes, about how other people are feeling

9.28.22  6:49 pm   how do i get motivated to do literally any thing other than use my computer to do things that aren't productive at all to me or even others i'm sick of this (by the way have a nice day ahead)

      you'll have to start thinking about you want

9.28.22  6:38 pm   will the sun be scheduled for maintenance?

      that seems plausible but the earth will need it first. also plausible

9.28.22  4:06 pm   favourite mathematical object?

      horsey

9.28.22  2:54 pm   What is your weirdest hobby?

      being normal

9.28.22  2:48 pm   what are your opinions on chess?

      too easy

9.28.22  2:26 pm   you said that princess song wouldve come right after might quit but it'd have been like a Frankenstein of old and new styles

     it would NOT have been. the reason it WAS a frankenstein (graphically) is because i did half the graphics in 2019 and the other half in 2021

     but it seems "money" is like that but without the pictures and different fonts.

     "money" mixes styles of 2013 and 2023, for other reasons

      i also think that a mix of old and new would be actually very interesting, so my question is do you live on earth

     yes i do

      and why

     i don't know

9.28.22  12:31 pm   is this legit

      is what? nevermind, yes it is

9.28.22  11:59 am   song that describes current economy?

      "the pound is sinking"

9.28.22  11:30 am   do you ever wish you could pause time and think about stuff for a moment?

      thinking requires time
